title: Chucky Goes Psycho
description: The urban legend of Chucky and Tiffany, two dolls supposedly possessed by serial killers. The dolls were found on the scene of real life murders which remain unsolved to this day.
quote: You’re not real! You were never real!
altHero: Chucky the doll holds up a knife
alt1: man in Santa Suit talks on a cell phone in the snow
alt2: Santa man leans in to inspect a doll leaning on a gravestone
alt3: closeup of the man’s face as a sinister female doll approaches from behind
alt4: Chucky and Tiffany stand over the dead Santa
